item.description:
IT'S A NICE DAY!

It rained all week last week, and it's supposed to rain all week next week. My Pugs are bored. My Frenchies are bored. Somebody, as yet unnamed, actually chewed a hole in one of my rugs. But today is actually a nice day! The yard is actually dry (if not yet raked for the summer...). Why waste it?

So, I am hosting an entirely spontaneous Pug Meetup!

Fenced yard, parking, fresh water, and four very bored little dogs provided. You can bring cookies and coffee or nothing at all. I have a bag and a half of Hershey's Miniatures and several bottles of naturally fruit flavored seltzer water, if anyone is desperate.

group.name: The South of Boston Pug Meetup Group

item.name: The Entirely Spontaneous Pug Meetup
